title: Stage Lv5-A3-S11
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The core of the argument lies in empirical evidence. (academic variant 1)
We reached the conclusion through logical reasoning. (academic variant 1)
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The core of the argument lies in empirical evidence. (academic variant 1)
We reached the conclusion through logical reasoning. (academic variant 1)
The argument should be verified from multiple perspectives. (academic variant 1)
We have considered potentially refutable points in advance. (academic variant 1)
We prove the hypothesis through systematic demonstration. (academic variant 1)
Logical consistency ensures the credibility of the argument. (academic variant 1)
Various pieces of evidence support the same conclusion. (academic variant 1)
We logically derived the conclusion from the premises. (academic variant 1)
We strengthened the argument through critical review. (academic variant 1)
The theoretical foundation supports the validity of the argument. (academic variant 1)
